The SOJOS Aviator Polarized Sunglasses are descent for an in-expensive pair of sunglasses. (Pictured on the right ) They feel nice when wearing them and do not fatigue my nose bridge when wearing them all day. Strangely these glasses are straight across with no curvature, so light does come in the sides a bit. They are lightweight, and polarized since I can see the squares in the glass of the back window of my car. As for quality, I think they will last as long as you aren't rough with them. They do not have the springs in the folding section on these glasses and the metal is thin. If you use them for what they are made for they will do fine.

I can say these glasses I am very impressed with them.  they feel so heavy duty.  its sturdy and elegant, feels like expensive sunglasses.  sun protection is great with no glare issues.  I would wish that it came with a nice sunglasses case instead of a flimsy bag.  gotten many compliments so far and really like them.  do recommend them.
